name: Curse of Ostia
description:
The Curse of Ostia is a 2D top-down adventure game in which, the player must navigate vast woodlands and hidden dungeons searching for his missing best friend, and to discover the root of strange on-goings in the kingdom.

Project developed as part of a University module to demonstrate a custom AI and Physics engine. Likely to update with additional features and bug fixes. 

Source files can be found at: https://gitlab.com/Ginaholic/curse_of_ostia
